passive.name: NEW DESTINY
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) NEW DESTINY
                                Graves' shotgun has some unique properties:Double Barrel: Graves must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attack speed reduces reload time slightly, but reduces time between attacks dramatically.12 Gauge: Attacks fire 4 bullets. Units hit take 72%  () + 24% () for additional bullets. Critical strikes fire 6 bullets and increase each bullet's damage by 50%. Structures only take 75% damage.Buckshot: Bullets cannot pass through enemy units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back slightly.

q.name: (Q) END OF THE LINE
q.description:
(Q) END OF THE LINE
 10/9/8/7s   65/70/75/80 
                                
                                
                                Fires a powder round that deals 70 physical damage (70/90/110/130 + 80% bonus ) and then detonates after 1.5s to deal an additional 80 physical damage (80/130/180/230 +  80/110/140/170% bonus ).Detonates in 0.25s if the round hits terrain.Deals 110% damage against monsters.

w.name: (W) SMOKE SCREEN
w.description:
(W) SMOKE SCREEN
 20/18/16/14s   75/80/85/90 
                                
                                
                                Throws a canister that creates a cloud of smoke for 4 seconds. Enemies within the smoke cannot see outside of it.Enemies caught in the initial impact take 60 magic damage (60/125/190/255 + 60% ) and are slowed by 50% for 0.5 seconds.

e.name: (E) QUICKDRAW
e.description:
(E) QUICKDRAW
 16/15/14/13s   40 
                                
                                
                                Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell and granting True Grit for 4 seconds. True Grit grants 13/18/23/28 Armor (stacks 6times) and refreshes when damaging non-minions.Dashing towards an enemy champion grants 2 stacks of True Grit. Each bullet hit on an attack reduces Quickdraws cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

r.name: (R) COLLATERAL DAMAGE
r.description:
(R) COLLATERAL DAMAGE
 75/60/45s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires and explosive shell that deals 300 physical damage (300/450/600 + 150% bonus ) and knocks Graves back from recoil. The shell explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, dealing 200 physical damage (200/320/440 + 120% bonus ) in a cone.Enemies damaged by the shell's initial impact do not take damage from the explosive cone.
notes: range, dealing 200 physical damage (200/320/440 + 120% bonus ) in a cone

situational_items_detailed.description: Core item for critical strike-based marksmen. Provides high attack damage and critical strike chance while amplifying critical strike damage. Essential for ADCs who want to maximize their late-game damage potential.
